author: Constante Gil
description: This boozier Spanish take on a Mimosa is authentically made with the juice of oranges from the Valencia region. Perfect for a lazy hot afternoon, preferably served with some Spanish sun.
name: Aigua de València
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass that has first been charged with Cava
